title: AI for Finance
subtitle: Intel Training Module
description: A comprehensive course on how AI impacts finance, banking, investments, personal finance, and ethics.

chapters.title: WHAT IS AI? SIMPLE INTRODUCTION TO AI AND WHY IT MATTERS IN MONEY
chapters.description: Understanding Artificial Intelligence and its applications in personal finance

chapters.title: AI Quiz: Match Applications
chapters.description: Match each AI application to its primary function. Drag or pair the left item with the correct right item.

chapters.title: SMART BANKING WITH AI
chapters.description: How AI is transforming banking services

chapters.title: AI Quiz: Fraud Detection with AI
chapters.description: Read the scenario carefully and type your response in the text box.

chapters.title: AI IN INVESTMENTS AND TRADING
chapters.description: Learn about robo-advisors and AI-powered trading

chapters.title: AI Quiz: Robo-Advisors and AI
chapters.description: Review each client's profile and type what portfolio you think the AI robo-advisor should recommend.

chapters.title: DATA IS MONEY
chapters.description: Understanding how your financial data creates value

chapters.title: AI Quiz: How Your Financial Habits Create Data
chapters.description: Reflect on your daily financial habits and answer the following questions.

chapters.title: AI FOR PERSONAL FINANCE
chapters.description: Using AI tools to manage your personal finances

chapters.title: AI Quiz: Bill Reminders and Payments with AI
chapters.description: List the bills you pay regularly and describe how you think AI can help you track, manage, or automate these payments.

chapters.title: ETHICS IN AI
chapters.description: Understanding ethical considerations in AI finance

chapters.title: AI Quiz: Real-World Challenges and Ethical AI in Finance
chapters.description: Design your own set of ethical guidelines for how AI should be used in finance.

chapters.title: THE FUTURE OF AI IN FINANCE
chapters.description: Exploring future trends and career opportunities
